value.name: Bud Gillett
value.description: Protestors Rally Around Fired Dallas Patrolman Jesus MartinezProtesters upset by the arrest and termination of a community police officer in Deep Ellum converged at city hall Wednesday.

value.description: Azle Police Officer Shoots & Kills Armed SuspectA police officer in Azle was forced to fire his weapon Sunday night, and an armed suspect is now dead. It happened at a home where there were ...
